snippet.title: Why Am I Dead At Sea - Release Date trailer
snippet.description:
Why Am I Dead At Sea is an adventure game to release for Steam on May 11, 2015.

You are on a boat at sea. Also, and more importantly, you are dead. To figure out why, you will need to inhabit the other residents of the ship and use them to investigate what led to your untimely demise.

www.whyamideadatsea.com
